content:
The Thunderbird email client is only available for desktop Windows, macOS, Linux and as a mobile version for Android.

They are looking for developers to work on a mobile version for iOS/iPadOS as per https://blog.thunderbird.net/2025/01/video-the-thunderbird-mobile-team/

There is no Thunderbird Accounts though there is Mozilla Accounts (formerly called Firefox Accounts til Nov 2023), however it not used with with the Thunderbird email client. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/access-mozilla-services-firefox-account
creator: James

content: Lees hiervoor dit artikel: Automatische accountconfiguratie

content:
Method 1: 1. "View" > "Sort by" > tick "From". 2. "View" > "Sort by" > tick "Grouped By Sort".

Method 2: 1. click "Message list display options" > "Sort by" > tick "From". 2. click "Message list display options" > "Sort by" > tick "Grouped By Sort".

(Please see attached images.)
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: - highlight the folder - click view>sort by>unthreaded (if menu bar is not visible, press alt key prior to clicking view.)

content: Asi jde o menu pravého tlačítka myši na lištu nad zprávami ve složce a zaškrtnutí požadovaných položek. Ke změně jejich seřazení pak dojde kliknutím levého tlačítka myši na horní lištu.
creator: poljos-moz

content: Díky za reakci. Nastavení změnu sloupců ve složkách archívu zpráv, včetně možnosti změny ve všech již dříve vytvořených, lze takto upravit. To znám. Můj problém je však v tom, že při vytvoření nové složky v archívu se mně vždy v nové složce zobrazí někde přednastavené sloupce, z nichž mně většina nevyhovuje. A tak musím pokaždé u nové složky měnit zobrazené sloupce, jejich pořadí a podle kterého sloupce se mají zprávy v nové složce řadit. Bohužel mám rád strukturované informace a tak nové složky vytvářím často. Rád bych měl v každé nově vytvořené složce archivu zpráv automaticky jen ty sloupce, které mně vyhovují a nemuset je pokaždé měnit.
creator: johny66

content: Riešilo sa to tu už viac krát. Doteraz nikto nenašiel možnosť takéhoto (defaultného) nastavenia. Takže každá NOVÁ položka = nové nastavenie.

content: there is a freeware utility at https://www.nirsoft.net/utils/passwordfox.html it states that it is for firefox, but if you set it to point to the thunderbird profile, it works fine. It may cause security warnings.
creator: davidsk

content: 102 was a stable release. Ignore any reference to 103, as that was not an official release. For your protection, I encourage going to settings>general and verify that no update happens without your approval. That is, you do NOT want automatic update. I also suggest creating a backup of your profile - I do this myself for all major upgrades. one way to do that is to: - exit thunderbird - at windows desktop, enter %appdata% in the search bar and press enter key. That should open file explorer at the username\appdata\roaming directory. - highlight the thunderbird folder and copy it to another place on computer or to external media.
creator: davidsk

content:
...můj klient Thunderbird, a tak jsem ho neuváženě smazal...

V prípade, že ste odstránili celý priečinok s profilom Thunderbirdu, tak je všetka doterajšia emailová pošta stratená. Skúste ten profil Thunderbirdu dohľadať ešte v "KOŠI" operačného systému Windows. Ak tam bude, tak ho obnovte - najlepšie bude ak si ho prekopírujete niekam úplne inam napr. do priečinka ZALOHA.

creator: rvriesman

content: The allmail folder is just - all mail, and that includes drafts. it also has all incoming messages and outgoing messages. That is why use of the allmail folder is rarely recommended when using an email client.
creator: davidsk

content: Cosa hai fatto esattamente? Che messaggio di errore ricevi esattamente?
creator: @next

content: It could be any number of reasons. One thing to check is to verify that the email address in incoming pane is the same as the email address in SMTP server pane. This problem is not uncommon when a user has multiple email accounts with the same provider and has the SMTP server settings crossed.
creator: davidsk

content:
Update:

I compacted all folders. Restarted TB and computer. Turned off Malwarebytes.

Now it will send messages, but fails trying to place a copy in the sent folder. But it still is unable to receive any emails. No error messages although I see various status messages about accessing the account flash by.

There is only one account, a standard Gmail account which I can access via a browser on the same computer without any issues.

When I try compacting the inbox again, it does flash that there are no new messages.

I turned Malwarebytes back on, nothing changed.

content:
Okay with lack of preview, I've posted and it appears that some of that formatting did in fact do something, but it's a bit random.

Four spaces leading worked for one line, but is impractical for a big code block.

In the three quotes separated text it turned the first line into bold and separated it from the rest of the quoted text.

For a block of html, let's see how the 3quotes is handled.
